title: Black Lagoon
summary: A group of mercenaries known as the Lagoon Company navigate the dangerous underworld of Southeast Asia, facing ruthless criminals and unpredictable situations.

title: Berserk
summary: A lone mercenary named Guts embarks on a dark and violent journey for vengeance and redemption in a world of demons and betrayal.

title: Attack on Titan
summary: Humanity battles to survive against titanic creatures known as Titans, who devour humans and threaten to wipe out the world.

title: Ghost in the Shell
summary: A cyborg policewoman investigates a dangerous hacker in a futuristic society where the lines between human and machine are blurred.

title: Death Note
summary: A high school student gains the power to kill anyone whose name he writes in a mysterious notebook, leading to a cat-and-mouse battle with a genius detective.

title: Hellsing
summary: The Hellsing Organization, led by Sir Integra Hellsing, uses a powerful vampire named Alucard to battle supernatural threats in Britain.

title: Steins;Gate
summary: A mad scientist and his friends discover time travel and face the consequences of tampering with time and their own destinies.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
summary: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a near-fatal encounter with a ghoul, forcing him to navigate a dark world filled with flesh-eating creatures.

title: Psycho-Pass
summary: In a dystopian future, law enforcement uses a system that can predict people's criminal intent, but a new detective questions its morality.

title: Black Lagoon
summary: A group of mercenaries known as the Lagoon Company navigate the dangerous underworld of Southeast Asia, facing ruthless criminals and unpredictable situations.

title: Elfen Lied
summary: A mutant girl with psychic powers escapes from a research facility, causing havoc while struggling with her violent past and pursuit of freedom.
